GameObjects

Class Point

  • java.lang.Object
    • GameObjects.Point
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Cloneable

    public class Point
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Cloneable
    Models a point in 2-D space.

    You may find that you need to modify the code in this class, or add members/methods; feel free, but of course be sure to document. (For example, what if you need to generate a random (x,y) value?)

    Author:
    Scott Dexter

        public Point clone()
